data.name: csProject
data.value:
<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web"> <PropertyGroup> <TargetFramework>netcoreapp2.0</TargetFramework> </PropertyGroup>
<ItemGroup> <Folder Include="wwwroot\" /> </ItemGroup>
<ItemGroup> <PackageReference Include="EntitySearch" Version="1.0.0" /> <PackageReference Include="Microsoft.AspNetCore.All" Version="2.0.3" /> </ItemGroup>
<ItemGroup> <DotNetCliToolReference Include="Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Tools" Version="2.0.1" /> </ItemGroup>
</Project>

data.name: Program
PropertyCopier
SearchHelper
Solution
data.value: Microsoft Visual Studio Solution File, Format Version 12.00 # Visual Studio 15 VisualStudioVersion = 15.0.27130.2010 MinimumVisualStudioVersion = 10.0.40219.1 Project("{[AlphaGuid]}") = "[Namespace]", "[Namespace]\[Namespace].csproj", "{[BetaGuid]}" EndProject Global GlobalSection(SolutionConfigurationPlatforms) = preSolution Debug|Any CPU = Debug|Any CPU Release|Any CPU = Release|Any CPU EndGlobalSection GlobalSection(ProjectConfigurationPlatforms) = postSolution {[BetaGuid]}.Debug|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Debug|Any CPU {[BetaGuid]}.Debug|Any CPU.Build.0 = Debug|Any CPU {[BetaGuid]}.Release|Any CPU.ActiveCfg = Release|Any CPU {[BetaGuid]}.Release|Any CPU.Build.0 = Release|Any CPU EndGlobalSection GlobalSection(SolutionProperties) = preSolution HideSolutionNode = FALSE EndGlobalSection GlobalSection(ExtensibilityGlobals) = postSolution SolutionGuid = {[OmegaGuid]} EndGlobalSection EndGlobal

data.name: Startup
